活动-披毛犀: 悲鸣着寻找失踪的幼崽 Bellowing mournfully over a missing Calf
在刺骨的雨夹风中支撑着身体 Bracing against a frigid, sleeting wind
正在咀嚼满嘴脆干的细枝 Chewing on a mouthful of crunchy dry twigs
用其巨大体重破开厚冰层 Cracking a thick ice pack with their tremendous weight
用前腿挖掘寻找任何草类的踪迹 Digging with their forelegs for any trace of grass

为了取暖挤作一团，形成一堆蓬松的角 Huddling for warmth, a mass of shaggy Horns
暂时加入一群猛犸象的群体 Joining up with a herd of Mammoths temporarily
缓慢地蹒跚而行，驮着游牧帐篷的材料 Lumbering slowly, carrying Nomad Tent materials
排成一列行进，穿过易发生雪崩的山口 Marching single file, down an avalanche prone pass
向新领地迁徙，因一只白龙苏醒而离开 Migrating to new lands, after a White Dragon woke up

在至少半身人高的积雪中缓慢跋涉 Plodding in snow at least as deep as a Halfling is tall
用角犁地，寻找稀疏的植物 Plowing with their horn, searching for scraggly Plants
拉着一辆由霜巨人驾驶的雪橇 Pulling a sled with a Frost Giant Driver
在地上打滚以甩掉冰块的毛犀牛 Rolling around on the ground to dislodge icy chunks
在结冰的水坑边抓挠，口渴难耐 Scratching at an iced over watering hole, thirsty
从背上抖落大量积雪 Shaking off a massive amount of snow from their backs
在巨大的花岗岩悬岩下避雨 Sheltering beneath a large Granite Overhang
用角铲开雪堆，希望能找到食物 Shoveling aside a drift with their Horn hoping for food
喷鼻并呼出大团蒸汽 Snorting and blowing out large clouds of breath-steam
剥下覆盖着雪的松树树皮 Stripping the bark from a snow-covered Pine
用巨大的角扫开雪堆 Sweeping a snowdrift with their huge Horn
高耸于驯养它们的矮人之上 Towering above the Dwarf that domesticated them

凶猛地撕咬咆哮的洞熊 Viciously gouging a roaring Cave Bear
避开风中飘来的偷猎者气味 Avoiding the scent of Poachers on the wind
因配偶饿死而狂暴冲撞 Rampaging after the death of their Mate from starvation
径直冲向一辆搁浅的马车 Barreling directly toward a stranded Cart
危险地游荡在霍比特人定居点附近 Roaming perilously close to a Halfling Settlement
正追赶敌对雄性，以将其逐出领地 Charging after a rival Male, to drive him from their territory

穿过脆弱的灌木丛 Crashing through brittle undergrowth
在平坦的田野上疾驰，扬起尘土 Rushing across a flat field, kicking up clouds

避开一堆巨大的骨头，由骷髅巡逻 Shunning a huge pile of bones, patrolled by Skeletons

嗅探潜在入侵者留下的巨大足迹 Sniffing the large tracks of a potential Interloper
